# MCPT CLI

> CLI for discovering, installing, and running MCP Tool Shop tools.

## Purpose
MCPT is the package manager for the MCP Tool Shop ecosystem. It discovers tools from a central registry, manages workspace configurations via `mcp.yaml`, and runs tools with safe-by-default execution (no network, no writes, no side effects unless opted in).

## Quickstart
```bash
brew tap mcp-tool-shop-org/mcp-tools && brew install mcpt
# or: pip install -e .
mcpt list --refresh
mcpt init
mcpt add file-compass
mcpt install file-compass
mcpt run file-compass
```

## Key Commands
- `mcpt list [--refresh] [--json]` -- list available tools from registry
- `mcpt info <tool-id>` -- show tool details
- `mcpt search <query>` -- find tools by keyword
- `mcpt init [path]` -- create `mcp.yaml` workspace config
- `mcpt add <tool-id> [--ref <version>]` -- add tool to workspace
- `mcpt remove <tool-id>` -- remove tool from workspace
- `mcpt install <tool-id> [--ref <ref>] [--venv <path>]` -- install via pip
- `mcpt run <tool-id> [--real]` -- run tool (stub mode by default, `--real` to execute)
- `mcpt doctor` -- check configuration health

## Constraints
- `mcpt` (not `mcp`) to avoid conflict with Anthropic's MCP SDK on PyPI
- Workspace config files are `mcp.yaml` (not `mcpt.yaml`) for ecosystem compatibility
- `registry.ref` pins the tool list version, not tool code; pin tools separately with `--ref`
- `mcpt run` defaults to stub/dry-run mode; pass `--real` to actually execute
- Tools default to least privilege; capabilities are opt-in
